ruleset.name: Custom Logging Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules to enforce logging best practices with case‑sensitive forbidden keywords.

rule.name: NoSystemOutPrintln
rule.message: Avoid using System.out.println; use a proper logging framework instead.

rule.name: NoSensitiveContentInLogMessages
rule.message: Logging statements should not contain sensitive or forbidden content (e.g. password, username, aws, secret, key, credential key, printStackTrace, getStackTrace, System.out.println, sql, or query).
rule.description: Disallow sensitive words in logging statements using either 'logger' or 'log'. All keywords are matched in a case‑sensitive manner.
